title: Transmission of IPv6, IPv4, and Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) Packets over Fibre Channel
source: Internet and Management Support for Storage
abstract:
This document specifies the way of encapsulating IPv6, IPv4, and
Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)
packets over Fibre Channel.  This document also specifies the method
of forming IPv6 link-local addresses and statelessly autoconfigured
IPv6 addresses on Fibre Channel networks, and a mechanism to perform
IPv4 address resolution over Fibre Channel networks.

This document obsoletes RFC 2625 and RFC 3831.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
